ollamar 1.1.1

Package index

API calls

Functions to make calls to the Ollama server/API

list_models()
Get available local models
pull()
Pull/download a model
delete()
Delete a model
generate()
Generate a completion.
chat()
Chat with Ollama models
embed()
Get embedding for inputs
embeddings()
Get vector embedding for a single prompt
test_connection()
Test connection to Ollama server
create_request()
Create a httr2 request object.

Options available for the models

Functions to get information about the options available

check_option_valid()
Check if an option is valid.
check_options()
Check if a vector of options are valid.
search_options()
Search for options based on a query.
validate_options()
Validate additional options or parameters provided to the API call

Utility or convenience functions

Functions that are useful for working with the Ollama API

resp_process()
Process httr2 response object.
create_message()
Create a message
append_message()
Append message to a list
prepend_message()
Prepend message to a list
delete_message()
Delete a message in a specified position from a list
insert_message()
Insert message into a list at a specified position

Internal functions and variables

Functions and variables used internally by the package

package_config
Package configuration
model_options
Model options
stream_handler()
Stream handler helper function
